oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Program, Yehudi Menuhin, Violinist, Ryman Auditorium, 1939 January 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A concert program for a concert performed at the Ryman Auditorium by Yehudi Menuhin, Violinist, in Nashville, Tennessee, January 4th, 1939. The front cover cites the “Auspices Woman’s Division, West End Methodist Church for Building Fund, Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, Tennessee, January 4, 1939.” Forms part of the Wilhelmina Webb Collection. 1 program.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Menuhin, Yehudi, 1916-1999
Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.)
